channel.title: Furys
channel.description:
Yea.. so im advising people who have 14m spare.. to invest in em since there going up alot each day.
400k today 300k yesterday 275k day before
yea so the price is greatly increasing.
Thoughts?

item.title: Furys
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:

People are dumping, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Furys
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:23, topic:340649”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=437019.msg3214767#msg3214767 date=1274581905]

not really discontinued, just an item that’s hard to get such as spirit shields.

how are furys hard to get? everyone has them!

Yea, but apparently 2.7m tokkul is like 80m? im prob wrong… but people wouldn’t want to make em anymore. and people die with em… so there are more going out of the game then coming into it.

I doubt it, there was an update recently in the obby caves I think, now monsters drop like 400+ tokkul easily.

Prob why it only went up 25k today then… imma sell tommorow if it goes down
[/quote]
no, this update was like 2 months ago[/quote]
more than that and they increased the amount of tokkul needed vastly.

Read full topic

item.title: Furys
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:3, topic:340649”]Guy A buys furys, puts them back on market.
Guy A tells Guy B to buy furies and resell them at a later date.
Guy B ends up buying Guy As furys
Guy B can’t resell the furys
Guy A ends up RICH, RICH, RICH!!!

Dats how it goes, right???[/quote]
+1

Read full topic
